com.samskivert.jdbc
Class TransitionRepository

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.jdbc.Repository
      com.samskivert.jdbc.SimpleRepository
          com.samskivert.jdbc.TransitionRepository

public class TransitionRepository
extends SimpleRepository

Used to note that transitionary code has been run to migrate persistent data. This is especially useful for data that one cannot examine to determine if it's been transitioned.

Nested Class Summary

          An interface for the transition.

public boolean noteTransition(Class<?> clazz,

Note in the database that a particular transition has been applied.

Returns:
true if the transition was noted, false if it could not be noted because another process noted it first.
